story:
Alluring Liqueurs, what's it about

To read more about our story please check out our web site at alluringliqueurs.com

I want to introduce you to a truly unique liqueur, Alluring Liqueurs® and the Brazilian market counterpart, Licores Sedutor®. What makes Alluring Liqueurs different; Cachaça, also known as Brazilian rum. The unique flavor of the cachaça blends perfectly with the flavors and sugars creating a truly unique product.  Alluring Liqueurs is a premium liqueur with a wide appeal as both a neat drink and mixer. With a sip of Alluring Liqueur you will take your tongue on a tour of Brazil ™.

I am Robert Kelly and I have a passion for cachaça and making liqueurs with cachaça.  I have spent 25 years in corporate IT as a project manager.  In 2007 I met my other passion, Genecy, now my wife.  We travel often to Brazil to visit family in Aparecida de Goiânia.  This is where I was introduced to cachaça.  I started making cachaça liqueurs at her sister's home; she served them at her bar (convenient, no).  We have conducted many taste test (parties) and have some great flavors to showcase.

We are Bold,

Determined, and
Committed

The mission of Alluring Liqueurs is to provide unique, high quality cachaça liqueurs and coolers. We specialize in the formulation, blending, bottling, distribution, and marketing of our products.

We blend the exotic flavors of Brazil with America’s adventurous spirit, please come on this journey with us.  Saúde!

What We Need & What You Get

We are offering some great perks; we have Alluring Liqueurs embroidered polo shirts and ball caps, souvenir bottles, a bottle of Alluring Liqueur, a Distilled Spirits Plant tour and sampling, an invite to one our BRAZILIAN Churrasco PARTIES at our home in Sandy Springs, GA. and even YOUR NAME on our production label.

Alluring Liqueurs is seeking $60,000 to begin operations and distribution in Georgia.

Alluring Liqueurs LLC is a single member LLC incorporated in the state of Georgia in March 2013, EIN 46-2554639.  We are to date a self-funded start-up.  Robert Kelly is the managing member.

Alluring Liqueurs LLC will produce two principal products, cachaça liqueurs and coolers. Liqueurs are 30% alcohol by volume (750 ml) and contain at least 2% sugar by volume. Coolers are 5% alcohol by volume (12 oz).

What is needed is how you can help...

  • a lease on a space to operate as a Distilled Spirits Plant - $1,250 /mo
  • local, state, and federal licensing and bonding - $2,500 / yr
  • supply chain contracts including cachaça, fruit concentrates, bottles, and labels - $58,500 / 4500 liters
  • distribution contracts

Alluring Liqueurs has 10 test formulas and we need to conduct a few more taste test to narrow down what flavors we will produce in our first year.

The goal is at least 4,500 liters of Alluring Liqueurs.  However we do have some flexibility in the quantities we produce; so we can get started with less, thus why this campaign is flex.  BUT HAY more is better, no?  YES!

2013 to Present

Alluring Liqueurs began in early 2013 applying for the necessary federal licensing and looking for a suitable location to lease as a distilled spirits plant (DSP). To date we have obtained all the required federal licenses except the DSP license which requires a physical location. We anticipate operating as a DSP locally in Roswell, GA. 

We successfully petitioned the City of Roswell to add a provision for alcohol manufactures; in November of 2013 the new ordinance was adopted by the city council. 

Alluring Liqueurs LLC has also researched product suppliers for fruit concentrates, cachaça, bottles, and labels.  Our goal for 2014 is to begin commercial production.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate your attention and value your time.  Thanks for taking the time to check out our campaign.  If you like what we are doing and want to get involved, but can't swing a monetary donation, please help us get the word out about this campaign.

Indiegogo share tools

Like us on facebook: AlluringLiqueurs

Follow us on twiter: AlluringLiqueur

Follow us on Instagram: AlluringLiqueurs


We have dreams and aspirations of world domination, starting with Georgia.

For Brazil operations Alluring Liqueurs LLC is seeking a partnership with an established entity that can provide cachaça, blending, bottling, and distribution services in Brazil.

please come on this journey with us.  Saúde!

story:
About the Ice Cream Truck of Love

We all like ice cream, so why should those who like a particular flavour miss out on all the fun? The Ice Cream Truck of Love is a non-political, areligious campaign to raise awareness for marriage equality in Australia.

The Senate is currently evaluating its stance on same-sex marriage in Australia, though, we believe this decision belongs with you. Our aim is to send our truck around the country offering ice cream and positive support of marriage equality, all with a simple message: Everyone deserves the opportunity to marry the person they love, no matter the flavour.

What We Plan On Doing

Starting in Sydney, working its way up to Brisbane and then back down the Australian eastern seaboard, the Ice Cream Truck of Love will appear in highly-frequented areas such as city centres, sporting venues and popular landmarks to spread the message to the real people of Australia. In exchange for ice cream, the public can learn how they can become involved in righting the country's stance on same-sex marriage.

How We Plan On Doing It

Through the generous support of financial contribution and pro bono services from our corporate partners, we hope to raise sufficient funds to see the Ice Cream Truck of Love's roadtip realised. Anything above our target will go back into the campaign in order to visit other capital cities and regional centres.

How We'll Use Your Donation

Your kind donation will go directly to funding the Ice Cream Truck of Love and its operation. This will involve leasing and transporting the ice cream truck, hiring of promotional and security staff, insurance, printing of promotional material and accomodation of our Ice Cream Truck of Love team. We appreciate your generosity and in turn will give you our complete commitment to the cause.

Why We're Doing It

We believe it's time this country revisited its outmoded stance on marriage equality. It has nothing to do with religion, nor should be paired with a certain party's political agenda—we just want a basic human right to be offered to everyone.

Please support by contributing to the crowd-funded campaign or by becoming a volunteer. Together we can get the Ice Cream Truck of Love and Australia on the road to marriage equality.

story:
History and Background

Brian Hobbs has a passion for wine and small business.  Upon finding this location in Maplewood, he knew that is was the perfect location for beginning a dream with his wife and daughter.  

Fifteen years ago, Brian's passion for wine was ignited at Stonehome Wine Bar in Brooklyn New York-rated number one wine bar two years in a row during his tenure at the bar.  An Advanced Sommelier through the Wine and Spirits Education Trust based out of London, and a Certified Sommelier through the Court of Master Sommeliers, Brian brings not only a passion but education that allows him to procure a wide variety of wines at every price point-from value driven wines for the everyday wine drinker to the collector wines for a wine enthusiast.  

The relationships he has built in St. Louis over the last five years with wine distributors and importers provide access to allocated wines that not all have access to in the area.  Based on his experience and these relationships, Chateau Maplewood will provide you with a value that you cannot get at any shop.  

What We Need & What You Get

We are selling gift cards in advance of opening to raise money to fund additional inventory and overhead.  For every $25 purchased in gift cards, you will get an additional $5!  

The Impact

We appreciate the support from our friends and family and we are excited to watch as our dream becomes a reality.  We want to share it with you every step of the way!  Maplewood is a community that we are proud to be a part of and look we look forward to growing our business with the city and our neighbors.  

Risks & Challenges

All small businesses have risk but based on our location, business model, and experience we feel like we have minimized many of those risks.  

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Follow us on Instagram @ChateauMaplewoodSTL
  • Share our campaign

story:
Help Us Make More Booze

Triple Sun Spirits Co is growing, but we need your help to do it faster. We're raising $10,000 to we can buy two new Stripping Stills, which will allow us to double our capacity, and make more booze faster. 

Opened in 2016, Triple Sun is the first and oldest distillery in Emmaus, PA. We've been growing steadily ever since, laying down our first barrel of bourbon to age August 2016, and recently releasing a special aged Stouted Whiskey with Weyerbacher for their 22nd anniversary. 

Our goal is to make more booze faster, so we can fill bottles, and more barrels. To do that, we need two new Stripping Stills. They'll help us double our production, so we can make more liquor in less time. This will allow us to fill bottles for sale, as well as barrels for aging, instead of choosing one or the other. 

So donate what you can, and Help Us Make More Booze.

story:
We are on a mission

We’re on a mission to breed natural flavors back into vegetables so we can develop the next-gen, plant-based products.

We all know that vegetables are healthy and sustainable, we should eat more of them. But, The problem with vegetables is taste! The majority of us just don't like the taste of vegetables. On top of that, industrially-grown vegetables hardly contain any nutrients and taste bland.

What if vegetables could be as tasty as your favorite snacks? 
This challenge brought a breeder, a food scientist, a designer, and a 3 Michelin star chef together with a mission: shift people's perception of veggies from boring to exciting.

Plant-based food and drinks based on vegetables

We created RadicL®: a range of 100% plant-based food and drinks with no high processing, no artificial additives, no added sugar or fat. Just vegetables.

At RadicL® we cross-breed new vegetable varieties specifically for taste.
Crossbreeding is a classic breeding technique but we’ve combined this with Artificial Intelligence, by doing this we could create new vegetable varieties in 2-3 years, which normally takes 6 to 8 years.

We literally re-invented plant-based food from the ground up. Beginning with the seeds. 

We select new vegetables with surprising flavors like a tomato with pineapple flavor or an eggplant tasting like meat. 

Products

Product name: RadicL® eggplant curcuma leaf patty 1.0

Ingredient list: eggplant 'Isaura’, curcuma leaf

Health benefits: improves digestion, high satiety, low-calorie, strong anti-inflammatory

A juicy aubergine burger with a spicy curcuma (otherwise known as turmeric) leaf kick. 

 

Product name: RadicL® eggplant walnut patty 1.0

Ingredient list: eggplant Isaura, walnut

Health benefits: lowers cholesterol, high satiety, low-calorie

A juicy eggplant burger with a subtle hint of toasted walnuts.

 

Product name: RadicL® RED barrel-aged bell pepper hibiscus 1.0

Ingredient list: water, bell pepper ‘Red hot bell’, hibiscus, black pepper

Health benefits: rehydrates and revitalizes the body

A refreshing, barrel-aged red bell pepper drink with floral notes of hibiscus.

 

Product name: RadicL® WHITE sweet pea apple fennel 1.0

Ingredient list: water, dwarf pea, apple, ginger, fennel seed

Health benefits: improves digestion

Light and refreshing, our sweet pea drink will leave you with a subtle aftertaste of fennel, anise and apple.

 

Product name: RadicL® fruity chili sauce 1.0

Ingredient list: chili pepper ‘Soft Sarah’ , apple vinegar, garlic, onion

A spicy, fruity red chili sauce.
 

Product name: RadicL® hot tropical chili sauce 1.0

Ingredient list: habanero pepper ‘Emmanuel bite’, tomatoberry ‘Orange drop’, garlic, onion

A spicy, yellow chili sauce with a tropical fruity twist.

 

Product name: RadicL® pumpkin coffee 1.0

Ingredient list: water, pumpkin ’small v1’, arabica coffee, dried fruits

Health benefits: boost physical performance, high in fiber, packed with nutrients

A barrel-aged, fruity cold brew coffee energy booster loaded with nutrients.

 

Product name: RadicL® sweet sex potato 1.0

Ingredient list: water, sweet potato leaf, calamansi, tongkat ali

Health benefits: energy-booster, enhance sexual performance

A fruity, sweet potato energy-booster and aphrodisiac with hints of citrus, herbal and bitter botanicals.

 

Product name: RadicL® tomato tropical botanical water 1.0

Ingredient list: water, tomatoberry ‘Orange drop’

Health benefits: rehydrates the body, antioxidants

A refreshing beverage based on our new variety of tomato which contains passionfruit and pineapple notes.

Product name: RadicL® eggplant floral botanical water 1.0

Ingredient list: water, eggplant ‘Aromata’

A refreshing beverage based on our new variety of eggplant that tastes like elderflower.

 

Product name: RadicL® PLAIN FRESH coconut eggplant 1.0

Ingredient list: coconut milk, eggplant ‘Isaura’, artichoke, lactic ferments

A fresh plant-based alternative to cream cheese with a subtle hint of coconut.

 

Product name: RadicL® FRESH coconut eggplant onion & chives 1.0

Ingredient list: coconut milk, eggplant ‘Isaura’, artichoke, onion, chives, lactic ferments

A fresh plant-based alternative to cream cheese with a subtle hint of coconut that contains onion and fresh chives.

What do we want to achieve?

We now have exciting prototypes, but we do need your support to make this revolution grow.

We aim at collecting 40k to prefinance vegetable growth and production. We grow our own vegetables at local farms in Belgium. Bottling of drinks is done at Belgian social cooperations.

By supporting our crowdfunding campaign, you will also support them!

We look forward to exciting each donor with our bold flavored perks!

Even if you can't donate, if you like our idea, you can anyway support us!You can follow RadicL on instagram and Facebook, like and share our posts.
Then, you can make some noise about our campaign, asking your folks to get the world out!
We will remember it and be grateful for your help.

story:
It all started

When we bought a brewhouse 2 years ago. 

A few negotiations later and we settled into the old Monroe Tool Rental Building in Monroe, NY as a location.  We are excited to bring a production brewery and taproom in Monroe.  We worked with a local architect to build out the space to fit our needs as it was a nice empty canvas.

 

What is the deal

Our loan is imminent! We have covered our equipment and leasehold improvements at this point!  This is where you can get some cool craft merch and get us through the next few months!

The Impact

This project is looking to create 2-5 local community jobs in the first 3 years! Additionally it creates a new place for people to gather and do some different things in the region.  

Risks & Challenges

We have gotten through most of the risky stuff at this point and are just awaiting signing our loan to finish our TTB application!  You can help us overcome our final hurdle!

Can't help?

Share the campaign!

story:
Unity Gardens, in an effort to increase the Bee population in South Bend, has created a sweet by product  "Honey From The Hood".  This honey is harvested by Beekeeper Tim Ives and the quality is awesome!!  It has won first place in the regional competition, and with 3 blends going to state, it won 1st, 3rd, and 4th place!!!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We want to send Tim to the National Beekeepers meeting/ competition in New Orleans in January 2014 to represent South Bend and our local Honey from the Hood 
  • If we do not reach our goal donated funds will go to putting up more Bee hives in our community. 
  • Help save the Bees!

The Impact

Honeybees are a valuable food security resource and building diversity in the genetics of the local bee population is one key factor in preventing colony collapse disorder. 

  • We want to make South Bend into "Beetown USA", a Bee friendly city. 
  • Honey from the Hood sales help support Unity Gardens an organization  dedicated to building a healthier community through providing unrestricted access to healthy food through supporting over 50 open vegetable gardens. 
  • Let' put South Bend on the map!!!

  • http://www.theunitygardens.org/
story_txt:
Unity Gardens, in an effort to increase the Bee population in South Bend, has created a sweet by product  "Honey From The Hood".  This honey is harvested by Beekeeper Tim Ives and the quality is awesome!!  It has won first place in the regional competition, and with 3 blends going to state, it won 1st, 3rd, and 4th place!!!


What We Need & What You Get

We want to send Tim to the National Beekeepers meeting/ competition in New Orleans in January 2014 to represent South Bend and our local Honey from the Hood 
If we do not reach our goal donated funds will go to putting up more Bee hives in our community. 
Help save the Bees!



The Impact
Honeybees are a valuable food security resource and building diversity in the genetics of the local bee population is one key factor in preventing colony collapse disorder. 

We want to make South Bend into "Beetown USA", a Bee friendly city. 
Honey from the Hood sales help support Unity Gardens an organization  dedicated to building a healthier community through providing unrestricted access to healthy food through supporting over 50 open vegetable gardens. 
Let' put South Bend on the map!!! 



http://www.theunitygardens.org/

story:
What is The Coughee Company?

The Coughee Company was born out of passion for two products; coffee and cannabis.  We want to provide a great coffee experience while giving the cannabis community a chance to be normalized in the general public without the negative stigma.  Though we will have a variety of Hemp CBD food & beverage option, we do not sell any THC based cannabis in any form!

The facility is designed to be an eco-friendly coffee shop, that is far from typical.  We will be involved and supportive in community initiatives regarding social justice and cannabis advocacy.  This will also be a place for local artist and wellness professional a place to facilitate their projects.

We incite Sustainability, Healing, Building, and Destigmatization.

Welcome to the Coughee Company!

We will be a full service coffee shop that offers a safe place for people to consume cannabis in a relaxed public setting without disturbing the public.  We welcome you to come kick back, roll up, enjoy some alone time, or come hang out with others.

The Coffee Shop

 We are a fully operational coffee shop open to the public where you can enjoy a great cup of coffee, fresh pressed juices, or create your own herbal tea.  Hungry?  Grab a light bite with our many pastries, sandwiches, fruits and veggie options.  We'll have plenty of hot food options as well.  We plan to partner with local food trucks, restaurants, and vendors to have a continuous rotation of food options in efforts to support local businesses!

Along with being an awesome coffee shop, we will have a gallery to showcase local artist, host events, farmers markets, and community meetings. 

The Coughee Lounge (The Consumption Area)

Have a "Sip of Coughee" with your coffee.  Still unsure what "coughee" really is?  What does smoking make you do sometimes?  Cough + Coffee = Coughee  (Yea...you see what we did there.)

Our Coughee Lounge will feature it's own coffee shop where we will offer the same menu as the public shop however; the lounge will offer an array of pieces and rigs for rent to aid with the medicating process.  Think Amsterdam style cafe in the US.  The biggest difference will be that WE DO NOT AND WILL NOT BE SELLING ANY THC CANNABIS PRODUCTS!  We will only allow people to bring in their own.

Every person that donates to our campaign will gain entry into our exclusive member area, no matter the donation size.  (With valid medical card)

Event / Community Space

Finding venues for events isn't that difficult in most cities.  Finding an affordable one, is a totally different story.  We will most definitely be utilizing our space for community events, farmers markets, yoga sessions, business meetings plus an array of other possibilities.  But we also want to provide event space at an affordable rate to those who need it.

We know sometimes budgets are tight but that shouldn't stop you for promoting a good cause.  We will be flexible with our pricing and terms for those who have a good cause but not able to due to the ridiculous cost of other venues.

Our Hemp (CBD) Infused Coffee

Our Hemp CBD infused coffees are made with high quality coffee beans that are fair trade certified.  We offer variety of beans from different regions in two soothing doses, 250mg and a 400mg option.

Why CBD in Coffee?

By adding Hemp CBD, our coffee eliminates the negative side effect many people experience from caffeine; no jitters, upset stomach, or crashing.  

Infusing bean during the roasting period allows us to craft an exceptional coffee without a hemp or altered taste, making our coffee a high quality experience.  You get to enjoy a clean, no oil reside coffee, unlike what you get with just adding CBD afterwards.

But what is CBD?

CBD or Cannabidiol is the non-psychoactive portion of the cannabis plant.  While THC in cannabis is what gets you high; CBD gets you healthy. 

CBD = Healthy / THC = High

Hemp CBD was legalized in the US through the Hemp Farming Act of 2018 and is CBD is known to assist with epilepsy, pain, diabetes, migraines, anxiety, appetite, stalling cancer cells, reduction of inflammation, and multiple other uses.

The Appreciation Parties

The Founders Party

The Founders party will be a private pre-launch celebration that will give our supporters with donations exceeding $100 the first exclusive look at the coughee shop. 

Every donation level that don't offer guaranteed entry to the Founders Party, you will get a raffle entry into the drawing in which we will giving away 10 additional passes to join the party.

The Donors Party

Didn't donate $100+; don't worry we will have an all Donors Party as well.  An all day event only for all persons that donated to our crowdfunding campaign.  It will still be an invite only celebration that you do not want to miss.

How Can You Help?

With a goal of $200,000; we set a high bar because we have big plans and want to develop a great facility for you.  We want to purchase our land, equipment, and build the facility from the ground up.  Sure, we could rent a building or land at a lower price, but we are then restricted to the rules of the landlord.  By owning the land and the building we can provide the best service and community functions with only the legal restrictions to consider and not the additional limitations brought on by outside owners.  We want to have the freedom craft and support our community the way we want.

There are over 2 million medical marijuana patients in the US; and over 200,000 Arizona.  With $2 donations from each patient in AZ we could accomplish our goal.  But even if you're not an Arizona resident this lounge will be a great way to support the community as a whole.  Although Arizona is still a medical state; we will be able to accept valid medical cards from any state in the US; we feel recreational legalization is soon to come which will then open up to all residents and visitors.

Financially Strapped?

We understand that not everyone is able to contribute through financial means, but for other ways to help our efforts, please reach out to us through email or social media.  And as always, spreading the word is always greatly appreciated!   ;-)

We would love for people to add to the comment section; submitting their thoughts and ideas for the coughee shop / lounge.  Whether it be ideas about community events we should host, a cool idea for a bike rack, or just something that you would like to see at the shop. 

We want to hear them all!

Our Memberships

The main coffee shop will be open to general public.  However, to get into the consumption area you will need a membership and a valid medical marijuana card from any state.  Everyone's first visit is complementary and those that supports our cause will get an additional complimentary visit as well.

 

The Expenses:

Facility / Construction:  $200,000

Land Cost:  $250,000

Equipment / Supplies:  $70,000

Furniture / Fixtures:  $10,000

Coffee Roaster:  $50,000

We don't expect for for all the expenses to be covered.  We want to lower these cost by focusing on choosing recycled and re-used furniture, fixtures, and building material.

Giving Back:

We give 5% of all sales to a selected charity every month.  All of the charities that we feature will be focused on education, social injustice, economically suppressed communities, at-risk youth, and environmental sustainability.

Future Expansion:

After our initial opening we plan to expand our facility to include other small business having there own space at a affordable cost.  If we raise enough; we'll add a small hotel on-site to offer a cannabis friendly places to stay for travelers or for those locals that want to experience a different kind of stay-cation.

We plan to expand our coffee shops to other states as well.  If you want to see us in a location near you, please let us know.

Additional Details:

Check us on IG: @thecougheeco   instagram.com/thecougheeco

Website:  www.thecougheeco.com

** Investment and partnership opportunities are available.  Please contact us by email at contact@thecougheeco.com **

Business membership options available.

All perks subject to change.  Terms, limits, and conditions will apply.*

story:
Created by John Tomalin-Reeves, dubbed 'the Dyson of the barbecue' by media, ZIGZAG is an ergonomic, wood-firing masterpiece designed to add a touch of theatre to your dishes. Whether it's slow-cooked shanks, sizzled sea bass or a speedy Margherita, ZIGZAG has the answer.

Below are just some of the reasons you need to buy a ZIGZAG today.

  • Floating Pizza Stone - The ZIGZAG features an innovative floating baking stone which allows for the flames to heat it from beneath as well as over the top. This means that the stone gets up to cooking temperature much quicker.

 

  • Compact and Portable - The ZIGZAG has a compact footprint which ensures that no excess material is wasted in production. Whether at home, on the beach, or at the campsite, ZIGZAG goes where you go.

 

  • Made in Britain - We are immensely proud that ZigZag has been made entirely in Wales. There is a huge amount of talent on these shores and buying this product supports British manufacturing and British jobs.

 

 

It's taken three years of development to perfect the ZIGZAG, here's what we've done:

  1. Flat top surface - allows the top of the oven to be used as a work surface.
  2. Thermometer points - allows temperature readings from different parts of the oven.
  3. Fixing Points -  allow for the addition of accessories as well as customisation.
  4. Removable Legs - make the ZIGZAG more stowable. Great for camping or tailgating.
  5. Floating baking stone - easily allows for a 12 inch pizza, casserole dish or sizzling pan.
  6. Heat Shield - protects surfaces below from heat and also doubles as a pizza peel pouch.
  7. Removable Backplate - to allow cleaning (and the addition of the gas module, 2020).
  8. Ignition Chamber - A lower chamber accommodates firelighters for foolproof lighting.

 

 

 

Check out our selection of mouth-watering dishes we’ve put together especially for ZIGZAG.

Seafood Pizza - 90 seconds

It took just 90 seconds to give this seafood pizza the ZIGZAG treatment, with spectacular results!

 

Sea Bass - 15 minutes

Fish will fall off the bone after 15 minutes in the ZIGZAG, giving you unbeatable flavour.

 

Pork Chops - 12 minutes

Our chefs raved about these tender chops, cooked with rosemary and white wine - a succulent success.

 

Grilled Aubergine - 6 minutes

Our vegetables have never tasted so good thanks to ZIGZAG's stunning dual heat zone which brings flavours to life.

 

Every single part of this product is made in Wales, in factories that support our communities and our families. We will never take production outside of Britain.
 

 

It has taken more than three years to develop the ZIGZAG - from the seed of an idea to the living, breathing product you can see today. We want you to support our crowdfunding campaign so we can give boost to the factories in Wales which have supported our development. They're ready to make your ZIGZAGs now!

 

 

John Tomalin-Reeves is the designer behind the ZIGZAG and he's also the man who created the Halo Cooltouch, the most successful British-built barbecue. John has brought his knowledge of heat and design together once again to create an outdoor oven with a stunning array of uses.

John has poured three years of life into ZIGZAG and is also responsible for a host of products with world-leading brands such as Bentley and Aston Martin. 

John is passionate about supporting his local community and lives in Penarth with his wife, three daughters and a selection of old bikes.

 

 

 

How much will the ZIGZAG cost on indiegogo?

The official retail price of the ZIGZAG will be £495 but it has been reduced by £100 during the crowdfunding campaign. It is a superb offer which gives you the chance to not only enjoy incredible food from the comfort of your own garden but to support British jobs too.

 

When will I receive my ZIGZAG?

Production will begin as soon as the campaign ends with the first ZIGZAG Ovens being delivered with 14 days.

 

Do you ship worldwide?

We certainly do. The countries we are shipping to are listed on our campaign page. Please be aware different shipping rates will apply depending on where you are in the world.

 

What happens after the campaign?

After the campaign, the ZIGZAG will continue to sell on our website for £495 (+P&P). To be notified about future updates sign-up to our newsletter and follow us on social media.

 

What fuel can I use in my ZIGZAG?

The ZIGZAG as standard is wood and charcoal fired as we've found this gives the best tasting food. For convenience however, we will be launching a gas adapter in 2020 that will work with all ZIGZAG models.

 

What's your refund policy?

Every ZIGZAG will come with a 1 year warranty for any manufacturing faults or defects.

According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends. Instructions can be found here. 

All ZIGZAGs are handmade to order and so cannot be refunded after the campaign finishes.

story:
Do you love fresh nut milk, but you don’t love the tedious process of making it at home? Are you tired of soaking nuts for hours or overnight only to have your nut milk last for a few days? Do you prefer nut milk that is chemical- and preservative-free? We understand. That’s why Brewista developed the NutraMilk.

 

 

 

NutraMilk’s patented, revolutionary method of making delicious, healthy nut milk from virtually any type of nut makes the once tedious process simple and fast. With NutraMilk, you can make up to two liters of your favorite nut milk in less than 12 minutes, compared to the hours or days it takes using other methods, and at half the cost. Unlike any other nut processor, its revolutionary design is patented, BPA free and UL certified, so you know it’s safe to use right now.

 

 

 

If you’re tired of chemical- and preservative-filled milks, or making your own using old-fashioned methods, NutraMilk is your ideal solution.

 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other nut milks can be loaded with chemicals and preservatives to keep the product fresh. Now, the NutraMilk nut processor lets you make two liters of smooth and delicious, ready-to-drink, 100% preservative- and chemical-free nut milk. NutraMilk is BPA free and has been submitted for NSF certification.

It's no secret that homemade nut milk often takes more time to make than it does to actually consume it. Now, you're less than 12 minutes away from two liters of deliciousness. You can make fresh nut milk in less time than it takes to brew a pot of coffee!

Unlike traditional methods that take up a ton of space on your counter and use a bunch of different kitchen accessories, the NutraMilk components can be put in the dishwasher for easy cleaning. Built to commercial standards, NutraMilk will stand up to heavy daily use. The container is also dishwasher safe for fast, easy clean up. Say goodbye to a messy kitchen!

NutraMilk can make it all! Whether you’re in the mood to sip on coffee with hazelnut milk or munch on some toast with a warm almond butter spread, this innovative machine can make it all! NutraMilk also creates delicious, creamy nut butter from almonds, cashews, peanuts, walnuts or milk from all of the above plus sesame seeds and rice.

When you take into account the amount of nut milk you are purchasing yearly and compare it to the cost of a NutraMilk nut processor and the ingredients to make the milk, the amount of savings is shocking. Think of it this way: 32 ounces of pre-packaged almond milk costs an average of $3. With NutraMilk, you can make 67 ounces of fresh, chemical-free, truly organic almond milk for the cost of the nuts!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Brewista NutraMilk is the brain child of Brewista president, Brian Gross, who recognized the need for a simpler and faster method for making fresh, wholesome nut milk. 

For more than three years Brewista has worked closely with the Industrial Design department of the Metropolitan State University of Denver. That relationship earned Brewista the MSU Denver Community Partner Award in 2016. The NutraMilk project was initially developed over the course of two semesters at MSU Denver in 2015. 

The research and ideations of the students were built upon and refined by Brewista designers and engineers to make the NutraMilk viable for manufacturability.

In 2017, the NutraMilk was selected as a finalist for the International Housewares Association Global Innovation Award competition.

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make NutraMilk a success.

We’ve set out with the goal to design a product that helps you create the most delicious nut milk and butter you’ve ever consumed, quickly. You’re helping us achieve that goal! We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase your own NutraMilk, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

 

 

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Do I need to soak the nuts? No. The NutraMilk uses only raw nuts and water to make nut butters and nut milks in under 12 minutes.

 

  • Does it make Soy Milk? No. Soy milk requires heating. The NutraMilk does not heat the ingredients, so the nut milk is ready to drink as soon as you make it.

 

  • What kinds of nut milks can I make with the NutraMilk? The NutraMilk makes nut butter and nut milk from virtually any type of nut.

 

  • What is the ratio of nuts to water? Two cups of nuts to two liters (or 8 cups) of water, so the ratio is 15% nuts to water. Each cup of nuts yields approximately 4 cups of milk.

 

  • Why does almond milk take longer to make than some of the other nut milks? The almonds take a little more time to breakdown. Twelve minutes for almonds and seven - eight minutes for all the other milks.

 

  • What temperature water should I use? You should use room temperature.

 

  • Is it temperature regulated or does it need to be transferred to another container afterwards for refrigeration? The NutraMilk does not regulate temperature, and the mixing container is not designed to be placed into the refrigerator. Once the milk is dispensed into a separate container, that container should be placed into a refrigerator. The separate container will be included with the NutraMilk when it hits the market.

 

  • Does the NutraMilk achieve pasteurized end product? The process of pasteurization requires sustained heating and rapid cooling. Since the NutraMilk does not regulate temperature, it does not pasteurize the nut milk produced.

 

  • How smooth is the end product? Prior to becoming nut milk, the nuts are made into a nut butter. When water is added, the milk is filtered through a 100 Mesh stainless filter, so it's pretty darn smooth!

 

  • I can make nut milk in my blender already. Why would I buy this instead? Making nut milk in a traditional blender requires nuts to be soaked for several hours or overnight. Once the soaked nuts have been blended, the pulp is still in the milk. The resulting mixture must be strained through a cheesecloth (or something similar) which is a messy and time-consuming process. The NutraMilk takes the mess, time and hassle out of the process.

 

  • Will NutraMilk be available in 220v? Yes, we have the 220v machine available. It should be ready to ship in December, pending country-specific certifications. Please select the "220v NutraMilk" Reward and note that it has a later shipping date.

 

  • Can I make less than 2L of nut milk? Yes, you can make 1L with 1 cup of nuts.
story_txt:
Do you love fresh nut milk, but you don’t love the tedious process of making it at home? Are you tired of soaking nuts for hours or overnight only to have your nut milk last for a few days? Do you prefer nut milk that is chemical- and preservative-free? We understand. That’s why Brewista developed the NutraMilk.   NutraMilk’s patented, revolutionary method of making delicious, healthy nut milk from virtually any type of nut makes the once tedious process simple and fast. With NutraMilk, you can make up to two liters of your favorite nut milk in less than 12 minutes, compared to the hours or days it takes using other methods, and at half the cost. Unlike any other nut processor, its revolutionary design is patented, BPA free and UL certified, so you know it’s safe to use right now.   If you’re tired of chemical- and preservative-filled milks, or making your own using old-fashioned methods, NutraMilk is your ideal solution. Gone are the days of it taking hours to make your own nut milk and butter. Forget soaking, grinding and straining nuts for the milk that you want. Whether you need cashew milk for your coffee, nut butter for your celery or toast or want to create your own unique nut milk blend for a healthy snack or beverage alternative, NutraMilk is for you. With NutraMilk, you can make your own nut milks and butters in just 7 to 12 minutes!      *This step will create the nut butter. If nut butter is what you desire, skip to Step Three.      Other nut milks can be loaded with chemicals and preservatives to keep the product fresh. Now, the NutraMilk nut processor lets you make two liters of smooth and delicious, ready-to-drink, 100% preservative- and chemical-free nut milk. NutraMilk is BPA free and has been submitted for NSF certification.It's no secret that homemade nut milk often takes more time to make than it does to actually consume it. Now, you're less than 12 minutes away from two liters of deliciousness. You can make fresh nut milk in less time than it takes to brew a pot of coffee!Unlike traditional methods that take up a ton of space on your counter and use a bunch of different kitchen accessories, the NutraMilk components can be put in the dishwasher for easy cleaning. Built to commercial standards, NutraMilk will stand up to heavy daily use. The container is also dishwasher safe for fast, easy clean up. Say goodbye to a messy kitchen!NutraMilk can make it all! Whether you’re in the mood to sip on coffee with hazelnut milk or munch on some toast with a warm almond butter spread, this innovative machine can make it all! NutraMilk also creates delicious, creamy nut butter from almonds, cashews, peanuts, walnuts or milk from all of the above plus sesame seeds and rice.When you take into account the amount of nut milk you are purchasing yearly and compare it to the cost of a NutraMilk nut processor and the ingredients to make the milk, the amount of savings is shocking. Think of it this way: 32 ounces of pre-packaged almond milk costs an average of $3. With NutraMilk, you can make 67 ounces of fresh, chemical-free, truly organic almond milk for the cost of the nuts!               The Brewista NutraMilk is the brain child of Brewista president, Brian Gross, who recognized the need for a simpler and faster method for making fresh, wholesome nut milk. For more than three years Brewista has worked closely with the Industrial Design department of the Metropolitan State University of Denver. That relationship earned Brewista the MSU Denver Community Partner Award in 2016. The NutraMilk project was initially developed over the course of two semesters at MSU Denver in 2015. The research and ideations of the students were built upon and refined by Brewista designers and engineers to make the NutraMilk viable for manufacturability.In 2017, the NutraMilk was selected as a finalist for the International Housewares Association Global Innovation Award competition. We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make NutraMilk a success.We’ve set out with the goal to design a product that helps you create the most delicious nut milk and butter you’ve ever consumed, quickly. You’re helping us achieve that goal! We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase your own NutraMilk, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!        Frequently Asked Questions
Do I need to soak the nuts? No. The NutraMilk uses only raw nuts and water to make nut butters and nut milks in under 12 minutes. 
Does it make Soy Milk? No. Soy milk requires heating. The NutraMilk does not heat the ingredients, so the nut milk is ready to drink as soon as you make it. 
What kinds of nut milks can I make with the NutraMilk? The NutraMilk makes nut butter and nut milk from virtually any type of nut. 
What is the ratio of nuts to water? Two cups of nuts to two liters (or 8 cups) of water, so the ratio is 15% nuts to water. Each cup of nuts yields approximately 4 cups of milk. 
Why does almond milk take longer to make than some of the other nut milks? The almonds take a little more time to breakdown. Twelve minutes for almonds and seven - eight minutes for all the other milks. 
What temperature water should I use? You should use room temperature. 
Is it temperature regulated or does it need to be transferred to another container afterwards for refrigeration? The NutraMilk does not regulate temperature, and the mixing container is not designed to be placed into the refrigerator. Once the milk is dispensed into a separate container, that container should be placed into a refrigerator. The separate container will be included with the NutraMilk when it hits the market. 
Does the NutraMilk achieve pasteurized end product? The process of pasteurization requires sustained heating and rapid cooling. Since the NutraMilk does not regulate temperature, it does not pasteurize the nut milk produced. 
How smooth is the end product? Prior to becoming nut milk, the nuts are made into a nut butter. When water is added, the milk is filtered through a 100 Mesh stainless filter, so it's pretty darn smooth! 
I can make nut milk in my blender already. Why would I buy this instead? Making nut milk in a traditional blender requires nuts to be soaked for several hours or overnight. Once the soaked nuts have been blended, the pulp is still in the milk. The resulting mixture must be strained through a cheesecloth (or something similar) which is a messy and time-consuming process. The NutraMilk takes the mess, time and hassle out of the process. 
Will NutraMilk be available in 220v? Yes, we have the 220v machine available. It should be ready to ship in December, pending country-specific certifications. Please select the "220v NutraMilk" Reward and note that it has a later shipping date. 
Can I make less than 2L of nut milk? Yes, you can make 1L with 1 cup of nuts.

story:
THE CHANNEL BOWL IS IN PRODUCTION AND READY TO PRE-ORDER!

We've been working closely with our local ceramic studio here in Portland, Oregon.  The tooling has been ordered and we have secured our delivery dates. 

While we are getting the production finalized, here's how to pre-order the Channel Bowl and get up to 40% off the retail price.

 

1. Decide how many Channel Bowls you would like then click, "GET THIS PERK."

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

3. Fill out the survey to let us know which color you want.
 

 

 

BEATS OUT THE BASIC BOWL & SPOON

No need to tilt your bowl to get the last yummy bite. When compared to an everyday bowl, The Channel Bowl and matching pairing spoon have performed outstandingly better at scooping without bowl tilting. 

 

 

SLOPED & STREAMLINED FOR BETTER SCOOPING

Food naturally falls or can be scraped into the channel. So finishing a meal requires less effort. The pairing spoon fits snuggly into the channel and smoothly glides, so you can easily scoop any last bits of cereal or final dollop of ice cream as it melts.

 

 

GROOVED & SMOOTH FOR SIPPING

Many countries believe, “If you’re enjoying it, sip it.” The center channel stretches from one side of the bowl to the other, creating the perfect funnel for sipping.

 

 

GRACEFULLY DIMPLED - SIZED & SHAPED FOR COMFORT & HOLD

Crafted for purpose and poise. These wide-ridged dimples were thoughtfully contoured with soft edges to provide a natural resting place for your fingertips. This creates a refined yet tactile exterior for a secure grip when carrying, pouring and lifting the bowl.

 

 

 

NOT JUST A BOWL - AN EXQUISITELY UNIQUE PIECE

Everything from the form to the finish was carefully considered. The colors are soft and tasteful, to go with any table setting - from a casual oatmeal breakfast to a lavish lobster bisque dinner. 

 

 

LOCALLY MADE IN PORTLAND OREGON

We are working with a local manufacturer in Portland, Oregon. After successful funding in our previous campaign we are now in the production stage. You will be able to pre-order The Channel Bowl at a special pre-order price. Every Channel Bowl will come with a brushed stainless steel pairing spoon.  We've looked at every aspect of the bowl, tested its form and functionality, and are now in the final stages. We're extremely happy with the result and are ready to go!

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We are committed to doing all we can to get all orders out as soon as possible. Our goal is to deliver rewards on schedule, but if demand is higher than expected or unforeseen challenges arise, delivery may be affected and we'll let you know immediately.

We are confident in our final product and couldn't be more excited to share it.

Thank you for helping us bring The Channel Bowl to the table,

Dave 
Luke & Lucy
