story:
For its excellence, we believe AIRCPHOLIC is the best air liquor product ever, it has raised more than $ 520,000 USD in Taiwan and Japan and received highly positive feedback from all the backers. AIRCPHOLIC is reaching out to the world through Indiegogo, and an exclusive offer is now available on this platform. Hurry! Click on "GET THIS PERK" for the limited special offers that will end by October.

Very remarkable! The warm air liquor makes you feel wobbly instantly like getting boozed up! There are plenty of aromas and a tiny bit of liquor scent in the air liquor. Since it is air basically, the fragrances flow smoothly from mouth to nose so elegantly; it tastes like the perfect marriage of liquor and cigarette sensations!

Gently pour any liquor over 35% ABV into the device and recreate the finest sensation based on the most appealing parameters acquired in food sensory evaluation experiment. The most satisfying pleasure generated by air liquor can be simply inhaled from the container, where lies the similar feeling of falling in love with the tipsy encounter that boosts your spirits.  

Sensory Evaluation is a crucial food research process to measure human sensation responses based on scientific approaches; by performing it directly on the users, the results will be closer to users’ real responses and reflect actual needs better than physical chemistry or instrumental analysis, tests have been continuously conducted since the prototype phase of AIRCPHOLIC. We identify the nuances of feelings that air liquors express under various temperature and gas densities by sensory evaluation, and we find the parameters that satisfy over 90% sensory evaluators, based on which we design AIRCPHOLIC. This explains why users have been profoundly fascinated by AIRCPHOLIC.

The sensational feeling that AIRCPHOLIC creates is low-calorie and hangover-free, it brings instant relaxing atmosphere with its amazing taste. “It is just like liquor cigar flows from your throat to brain. The exquisite fragrance inhaled through the nose will fill up the entire cavity of your mouth immediately, the taste of liquor changes constantly, just like it is attempting to challenge my taste buds. It warms up my body and limbs, soon results in physical relaxation.

“Once you try it, you will be amazed by the unique experience. AIRCPHOLIC creates fascinating experiences that make the concept of time less important; some might describe it as 'The treasure that God left in the world before he returned to heaven.' ”    

“Slowly pour any liquor over 35% ABV into the device, and gently place your tongue on the tip of the straw and inhale through it, letting air liquor travel through your tongue down to your throat. Every inhalation surprises you with the smooth, cigar-like air liquor experience.”

Ernest Hemingway’s The Old Man and The Sea is our favorite classic. An old man named Santiago is a symbol pf ingrained human obstinacy. Most of the time, ordeals in life can make us suffer and spark our fierce reactions; as a matter of fact, we don't necessarily have to feel paltry and small when facing our fates. Once we dare to give it a shot, make a difference, we can take control of lives in our hands. 

Life’s full of possibilities, be a perseverant hero.

AIRCPHOLIC is the first Air Liquor product developed through food sensory evaluation techniques ever. It brings you the extraordinary experiences that you had never had before. Through this video, we show our highest respect to those who dare to challenge all the difficulties in lives!

 

Liquor looks like smooth, fluid water, but its soul conflicts with its appearance, deep inside there’s a more complex undercurrent hidden, intense and passionate, just like fire. We keep the core concept of “firewater” in mind which leads us to a simple and neat design, and outlines the product that contains the concepts of unyielding and soft, intense and relaxed, harmony and incompatibility at the same time.

With this primary cognition, we merge two conflicting geometries－sphere and rectangle－to create the unique, tense but also incredibly balanced atmosphere. The shiny and transparent glass material allows us to observe the waterfall-like air liquor stream down the inner surface, let us be amused by its wonderful looks and tastes. 

AIRCPHOLIC’s glassware was completely hand blown by master artisans in Taiwan. Each step is crucial; the amount of viscous molten glass collected on the tip of blowpipe must be precise, otherwise an uneven shaping might take place in the following steps. Glassblowing is just like performing on the most difficult musical instruments, there must be enough air blown into the pipe for successful expansion of a molten blob. The artisan takes the exact amount of molten glass into a refractory mold based on his experiences, and then adjusts to perfection by continuously observing and blowing. All the steps require extra attention to details, and the semi-finished products will be abandoned once a tiny mistake takes place. The quality depends mostly on the skill and performance of the artisan.  

The streamline pattern on glass stand manually traced in fine gold is reminiscent of Ogata Kōrin’s famous painting “Red and White Plum Blossoms”; there is a touch of Zen in the concise subject and the splendid, subtle grid of gold leaf. It also brings Gustav Klimt’s “Adele Bloch-Bauer I” to our mind with its dignified, graceful and elegant decorations.

AIRCPHOLIC is a perfect marriage of food science and glass crafting; its exquisite appearance is designed in precise details: 3.86-inch/98mm -diameter sphere, 2.99-inch/76mm desired flame height, 0.55-inch/14mm bore and the maltodextrin coating on inner surface of the sphere allow air to flow on each inhalation; these details were constantly adjusted and calibrated to reach the parameters of exhibiting the most appealing air liquors. A small variance on the dimension of the sphere or bore size might lead to imprecise temperature regulation, and the air liquor generated might burn your mouth or be flat and dull.     

The temperature remains steady at 154.4°F～172.4°F（73±5°C）within 2 hours use. Just add any liquor you wish to taste and enjoy the best experience that air liquor delivers. The taste of liquor will be elevated to a whole new level; let the rich flavor relaxes your body as if you’re on holiday with the premium cigar holding between your fingers. 

  • 100% Hand blown glass ball

        We adopt lead-free, heat-resistant borosilicate glass as the material for AIRCPHOLIC’s liquor container, it is durable to an instantaneous temperature difference of 212°F(100°C) and free from risks of cracking or shattering when subjected to it. The inner surface is sandblasted with Maltodextrin for a better effect on enriching the tastes of different air liquors.

  • 100% Hand blown glass stand

        AIRCPHOLIC’s glassware was 100% hand blown by master artisans in Taiwan. The glass stand is also made of lead-free, heat-resistant borosilicate glass with durability over an instantaneous temperature difference of 212°F (100°C) and a thermal durability up to 1292°F(700°C).

  • AIRCPHOLIC straw accessory kit (316 stainless steel straw + cleaning brush)

        High-purity, corrosion-resistant 316 stainless steel was processed under strict food production procedure which includes grinding, polishing, passivating and then dry heat sterilization. 

  • Grommet

        Rubber grommet for fixing stainless steel straw at a proper height for a better, more convenient use and to avoid straw from colliding with the glass ball.

  • Stainless steel funnel

        304 stainless steel funnel is for pouring liquor into the glass ball, you may also rest the straw on it as a straw holder when not in use; an overheated straw might reduce palatability. 

  • Non-reusable, odorless candle

        The 1.5x0.59 inch (38x15 mm) candle has a good thermal stability which lasts for 4 hours; you may replenish your supply with GLIMMA candle from IKEA for a better consistent use.

Enjoy the breeze that boosts your energy in this liquor banquet, it is easy and fun to use. When assembling AIRCPHOLIC, the unique atmosphere, excitement and anticipation remind us of the curiosity and joy we had when gluing parts together on a model kit back in our childhoods. It is fun to enjoy the pleasure brought by AIRCPHOLIC either alone or with friends.

AIRCPHOLIC project has received a lot of support in Japan and Taiwan and the products have already been shipping to all the campaign backers.

We further launch this campaign on Indiegogo based on our successful experiences; this is also NatureGift’s first step to break into the Western markets. We look forward to collecting more and more users’ experiences on how AIRCPHOLIC harmonizes with finest spirits around the world. We have excluded all the possible production problems, yet our delivery date might be influenced by the actual status of local logistics, leading to potential shipping risks. Your support is highly appreciated and we will be dedicated to offering you the best air liquor feast ever in the shortest time possible.

The standard AIRCPHOLIC product offers you a candle, due to some international airmail restrictions; we might not offer the candle according to the local regulations, in this case, you just need to purchase the GLIMMA candles from nearest IKEA for use. (For the best results and for your safety we recommend only GLIMMA candles.)

NatureGift is a Taiwanese team of scientists that specializes in food chemistry; we provide numerous companies in food industry with our services which include ethanol blending techniques, setting formulas of wheat varieties/flours from Australia and developing meat analogues based on our scientific background knowledge. NatureGift often takes the path not trodden in traditional food industry. Since innovation is our core value, we resolve to create new possibilities and fun in human senses through various techniques in food chemistry, bringing sensory experiences to a whole new level that no one has ever reached before.

 


Q1. Since I’m under 18, I wonder if I can order AIRCPHOLIC products.
A1. Under most of the laws around the world, you’re not allowed to purchase alcoholic drinks if you’re under 18; however, you can still order AIRCPHOLIC products considering that AIRCPHOLIC is an eye-catching glassware with exquisite designs. You may try the magical air liquor effect when reaching the age of majority. 

Q2. How to clean the device?
A2. The gasification of liquor is completed when droplets stop forming on the surface above liquor; blow out the candle through the pore and clean the device after it has completely cooled down. You may insert the straw into the glass ball and let the liquor left inside flow out through it; wash the glass ball with water and put it in a dish dryer or above a lighted candle for proper drying, preparing for the next marvelous experience.

Q3. Where AIRCPHOLIC originates?
A3. AIRCPHOLIC is produced in Taiwan; designed by a team of Taiwanese food scientists and the glassware is 100% handmade in Taiwan.

Q4. What are the differences between AIRCPHOLIC and other gaseous liquor devices?
A4. Liquor gasification can be achieved through three approaches including ultrasonic atomization, high-pressure gasification or distillation; ultrasonic atomization can generate smoke but the mouthfeel is flat and unpleasant, on the contrary, there will be no smoke generated in AIRCPHOLIC device. It aims to offer you the finest sensory experience based on the most appealing parameters acquired in numerous food sensory evaluation experiments that can satisfy 90% of sensory evaluators.

Q5. Does AIRCPHOLIC have warranty?
A5. AIRCPHOLIC is not warranted against artificial damage; when receiving a defective or damaged product as a result of any non-artificial damage, we will provide full support in exchanging it. Be sure to contact us immediately once this situation takes place; a request proposed three days after delivery will not be attended to.

Q6. For whom AIRCPHOLIC air liquor is suitable?
A6. In our point of view, all the liquor lovers will fall for AIRCPHOLIC, for it offers entertaining drinking experiences beyond ordinary; on top of that, cigar connoisseurs will surely be obsessed with it. 

Q7. Is it safe?
A7. Among all the gaseous liquor devices available on the market, AIRCPHOLIC is the only product that adopts lead-free, heat-resistant borosilicate glass as its material and designed based on precise parameters; AIRCPHOLIC can tolerate an instantaneous temperature jump within 212°F (100°C) which effectively eliminates the risks of shattering.

Q8. Can I drive after using AIRCPHOLIC?
A8. To drive immediately after tasting AIRCPHOLIC air liquor is forbidden, yet the time consumed for air liquor to be metabolized is shorter than that in regular alcohol metabolism. 30 minutes after the last inhalation, your BAC level will drop to 0% rapidly and it will be safe to drive then.

Q9. As an asthma patient, can I use AIRCPHOLIC?
A9. We reckon that it is better to not to smoke anything if you have asthma, alcohol intolerance or sensitive respiratory system, therefore we do not suggest using AIRCPHOLIC.

Q10. Will there be smoke generated during use?
A10. There will be no smoke generated while using AIRCPHOLIC since it offers you cigar-like, tobacco-like mouthfeel of air liquor and has no direct combustion that generates smoke. It is a secret delight that you can enjoy privately in the office without being noticed. 

Q11. What would happen to the liquor that I poured in? Gasified? Disappeared? Or leave only alcohol-free liquid in the bottle?
A11. Alcohol in the liquor will be partially gasified; when there’s no gaseous ethanol movement observable in the bottle or the mouthfeel turns flat, it means there’s not much alcohol left in the liquor, mostly just water, carbohydrate and flavoring substances. You may empty the bottle and pour in new liquor afterward. 

Q12. 100% handmade AIRCPHOLIC is fancy but also a bit pricey; have you ever considered putting into mass production? 
A12. There’s an important reason why we keep AIRCPHOLIC completely handmade; only when applying handmade techniques, the uniqueness of AIRCPHOLIC and the sensation it creates can be fully expressed. We offer you the best price during our Indiegogo campaign, and within this price range, you can barely find any other glassware manually traced in fine gold that is manufactured in Taiwan. And currently, we have no plan for low-cost mass production of AIRCPHOLIC.

Q13. Is it only for hard liquor? Can I still taste the aroma of liquor during the use?
A13. Only liquors over 35% ABV are adoptable for AIRCPHOLIC, better yet, over 40% ABV. Through AIRCPHOLIC, the wonderful flavors of liquors get to be fully released in their gaseous state; the uniqueness and richness of aromas will continuously tickle your taste buds providing you with ultimate enjoyment. 

If you have further questions or wish to contact NatureGift, you may press the bottom below to send us an email.

Be sure to contact us immediately once this situation takes place; a request proposed three days after delivery will not be attended to.Q6. For whom AIRCPHOLIC air liquor is suitable?A6. In our point of view, all the liquor lovers will fall for AIRCPHOLIC, for it offers entertaining drinking experiences beyond ordinary; on top of that, cigar connoisseurs will surely be obsessed with it. Q7. Is it safe?A7. Among all the gaseous liquor devices available on the market, AIRCPHOLIC is the only product that adopts lead-free, heat-resistant borosilicate glass as its material and designed based on precise parameters; AIRCPHOLIC can tolerate an instantaneous temperature jump within 212°F (100°C) which effectively eliminates the risks of shattering.Q8. Can I drive after using AIRCPHOLIC?A8. To drive immediately after tasting AIRCPHOLIC air liquor is forbidden, yet the time consumed for air liquor to be metabolized is shorter than that in regular alcohol metabolism. 30 minutes after the last inhalation, your BAC level will drop to 0% rapidly and it will be safe to drive then.Q9. As an asthma patient, can I use AIRCPHOLIC?A9. We reckon that it is better to not to smoke anything if you have asthma, alcohol intolerance or sensitive respiratory system, therefore we do not suggest using AIRCPHOLIC.Q10. Will there be smoke generated during use?A10. There will be no smoke generated while using AIRCPHOLIC since it offers you cigar-like, tobacco-like mouthfeel of air liquor and has no direct combustion that generates smoke. It is a secret delight that you can enjoy privately in the office without being noticed. Q11. What would happen to the liquor that I poured in? Gasified? Disappeared? Or leave only alcohol-free liquid in the bottle?A11. Alcohol in the liquor will be partially gasified; when there’s no gaseous ethanol movement observable in the bottle or the mouthfeel turns flat, it means there’s not much alcohol left in the liquor, mostly just water, carbohydrate and flavoring substances. You may empty the bottle and pour in new liquor afterward. Q12. 100% handmade AIRCPHOLIC is fancy but also a bit pricey; have you ever considered putting into mass production? A12. There’s an important reason why we keep AIRCPHOLIC completely handmade; only when applying handmade techniques, the uniqueness of AIRCPHOLIC and the sensation it creates can be fully expressed. We offer you the best price during our Indiegogo campaign, and within this price range, you can barely find any other glassware manually traced in fine gold that is manufactured in Taiwan. And currently, we have no plan for low-cost mass production of AIRCPHOLIC.Q13. Is it only for hard liquor? Can I still taste the aroma of liquor during the use?A13. Only liquors over 35% ABV are adoptable for AIRCPHOLIC, better yet, over 40% ABV. Through AIRCPHOLIC, the wonderful flavors of liquors get to be fully released in their gaseous state; the uniqueness and richness of aromas will continuously tickle your taste buds providing you with ultimate enjoyment. If you have further questions or wish to contact NatureGift, you may press the bottom below to send us an email.

Lunchtime: It’s the most difficult time of the day to control what you eat. 
Eating out or getting takeout can be costly and it's almost impossible to know what's in the food.
That's why we created the Prepd Pack, a revolutionary new take on the humble lunchbox.

 





 

 
From planning and preparing, to tracking the nutritional value of your lunches, together with our app, Prepd Pack makes the whole process easier and more enjoyable.  
Prepd Pack consists of a beautifully designed case, a premium modular system of containers and smart magnetic cutlery.


 
The removable modular containers are central to Prepd’s functionality — corresponding to each day’s needs, these individual food compartments can be combined in multiple configurations within the Prepd Pack. Made from the highest-quality materials, the containers are food-safe and completely leak-proof. 
 

 
Our immersive app makes prepping your lunches for the weeks ahead simple. We partnered with professional chefs and nutritionists to create an evolving library of recipes tailored to fit a broad range of diets, appetites, and health goals.
All available recipes are designed to fill the modular containers, perfectly — making meal prepping less complicated, and, by eliminating unwanted food waste, more efficient.
Get ready for a simpler and smarter grocery-shopping experience — our app will take care of organizing shopping lists, so you’ll know exactly what to buy the moment you get to the store.
The Prepd app will be available for both Android and iOS smartphones and will be free for all backers.
  

 


 

 
Finding calorie counting difficult? Relax — the Prepd app does all the math for you. By filling your Prepd Pack (and tummy) with our mouthwatering recipes, you’ll gain instant access to precise and in-depth nutritional information.
All collected data is stored within the app, giving you meaningful on-demand feedback about your diet. The app will also connect with HealthKit on iOS, allowing you to conveniently navigate all your health and fitness information in one place.
  

 


 
The app is filled with prep-friendly meal plans, making batch cooking extremely efficient — just imagine preparing a week’s worth of lunches in under an hour.  
Developed by experienced meal preppers, these original plans are delicious and ingeniously diverse, making your everyday meals exciting and uniquely different.
We've done the hard work, so you don't have to. Bon appétit!
 




 


 

 
The modular glass-clear containers nest perfectly atop one another, making fridge storage neat and (since you can plainly see what’s inside each container) insightful.
Have your lunch ready to go when you are — order multiple sets of containers and prep ahead for as many meals as you want. 
Save time for other things, like enjoying your morning coffee.
 
  


 

 
Joining the Prepd community lets you connect and share ideas with people who, like you, are passionate about food and health — a place to discover endless amounts of tips and tricks for prepping better lunches.
By creating your very own profile page, you’ll be able to browse the interactive library and save recipes to curate your own meal plans.
  


 

 
Homemade lunches are infinitely healthier — keeping both you and your wallet in better shape. With the Prepd Pack you can enjoy a delicious lunch and save money. *Spending values obtained from the 2015 Lunch Survey by Visa.



 

 
The ever-increasing amount of plastic packaging is exacerbating the environmental footprint. Unlike takeout, using the Prepd Pack is completely waste-free 
We don’t just talk the talk, we’re serious about sustainability. In an effort of tackling climate change, we’ve chosen to manufacture the Prepd Pack from high-quality recycled and eco-friendly materials.
 

 
Take part in the fight for our planet. Cut down on unnecessary food waste by preparing your own lunches and controlling exactly how much you consume.  


 


The Prepd Sleeve will insulate your Prepd Pack with a layer of premium fabric-lined Neoprene (a flexible, heat- and wear-resistant material, used for making wetsuits) — providing extra protection and ensuring your food’s temperature stays consistent during longer commutes.


The Sleeve’s stylish strap also allows you to carry the Prepd Pack in one hand, effortlessly and securely. Personalize your Prepd Pack’s color, choose either Stone Grey, Charcoal Black, or Prepd Blue.



Freeze the cold packs overnight and clip them inside your Prepd Pack to keep your food cool and fresh for even longer. Seamless and unobtrusive, the cold packs easily dock along both sides of the Prepd Pack without taking up any usable space.  






 


 Years in the making, and leaving no stone unturned, we have meticulously considered every functional and aesthetic detail of the Prepd Pack.

 First Prototype
 
Together with knowledgeable nutritionists and innovative meal preppers, we’ve created a solution that will put an end to all your hesitations about taking your homemade lunch to work.
CMF and DFM process
 
Modern look, contemporary build — so you can trust that your food is sealed and secure, and that you look chic carrying it around.
 Current Product
 



 

 
We are really excited about bringing the Prepd app to life. And not without reason — more than a simple recipe bank, the app will help you regain control over lunchtime, hit health goals, and stick to resolutions.
Our app’s UI design is clean, is easy-to-navigate, and is cross-device functional. Plan your meals on your iPad, then get your shopping lists on your iPhone — and Android devices too!
 


We are a team of award winning designers and engineers with the united goal of make healthy living easier and more enjoyable through good design.
 

 
Engadget / TechCrunch / SELF Magazine / Brit + Co / Core77 / Tech Insider / Inhabitat / Mental Floss / Mashable / Notable / Gear Hungry / Digital Trends / Startup Daily / Lovin Dubai / Tech In Asia / Slash Gear / Gizmag / PSFK / Design Taxi / International Business Times UK / GadgetSin / Ubergizmo / e27 / Contemporist / Foodie / HiConsumption / Lovin Trends
Interested in writing about us? Our press kit is available for download here. Also, please feel free to email us directly at hello@getprepd.com or leave a message if you have any questions.

story:
Summary

  Max Boeke and Jordan Standish started home brewing over ten years ago, before they were of legal age to do so (that can be our secret...). As their quest for knowledge and brewing gravitas grew, the old brew stand of welded together bed frames was transformed into a handmade semi automated system that would brew hundreds of gallons of beer. While gathering industry experience, from distribution to production brewing, Jordan and Max had their sights on starting their own business, a brewery with strong community roots and a classic styling that produces unique beers that people of all walks of life can enjoy. Unless you're a kid. If you're a kid then you can enjoy the craft sodas Clutch Brewing will make.  Thus, Clutch Brewing Company was born. 

The Name and the Space          

  Since Jordan and Max grew up in motor oriented families, Clutch seemed like the perfect analogy for highlighting the power of the community, and the ever growing appreciation for craft beer that is shifting the craft beer industry into the next gear. In the spring of 2017, Clutch Brewing Company signed a lease for the mezzanine level of the Keg and Case Market. Occupying the old keg house of the historic Schmidt Brewing in St. Paul, MN, the Keg and Case Market will house restaurants, a coffee shop, dessert shops, and a 30 stall indoor farmers market which will offer a variety of locally grown foods, crafts, and small plate vendors. Clutch Brewing Company will be lofted above it all with a tap room and brewery that will provide exceptional views of the action below. The tap room will also feature a lounge for more comfortable social interactions and a  small museum to pay homage to the history of one of Minnesota's most Iconic brewing landmarks. Working with local artists has always been an important part of Clutch Brewing, which is why there will be a local St. Paul art gallery to display local works, and offer exposure during our Beer/Artist of the Month collaborations. At Clutch Brewing, we don't want to just offer fantastic beer, we want everyone who walks through our door to experience everything that makes St. Paul such a great place. 

 

The Beer!

What kinds of beer do we brew? All kinds. Here are just a handful of examples of what we will be brewing. Over the years, we have constantly refined recipes and our craft which has resulted in numerous awards for our beers. We can't wait to share them with you in the tap room!

Outta' Style Classic American Cream Ale- A dry hopped take on an American classic with a delightfully hoppy nose and slightly malty body. Light and refreshing. It's our Cream Ale to your Pale Ale. Or, your Cream Ale to our Pale Ale. Either way, it's hard to only have one.  ABV: 5.5%

Sweet Jane Milk Stout- Rich and full bodied, this lovely beer has hints of chocolate, coffee, and roast, while remaining smooth with a creamy finish. This is among our favorites and is truly a joy anytime of year. ABV: 6%

Exhaustdead Smoked Black IPA- This distinct IPA has a hint of smoke over a roasty malt backbone, providing a slight dryness that compliments the herbal bitterness of Columbus hops. This one will remind you of bonfires and bacon, while making you forget about the horrifying bacon bonfire of 75' .  And yes, that is a fictitious and delicious event. ABV: 7%

Barnstomp Bier de Garde - This french style ale is clean but malty with hints of toast, biscuit, and toffee with just a touch of black currant. It's the perfect way to end the day, or start the day, depending on your intentions. ABV: 7%

Straight 8 American IPA- Definitely for the IPA lover at heart. Loads of citrus and stone fruit with a clean bitterness to balance. ABV: 7%

Chrysalis Chai Infused Rye IPA- Infused with Chai tea and brewed with Rye malt, this one presents a warm subtle spice that blends with the fine citrus qualities of a unique blend of Pacific Northwest hops. ABV: 6.5%

 

Goals, Impact, and Rewards!

  Your contribution will help bring a brewing tradition back to a brewery complex that dates back over 160 years! It will also help us create one of the most unique tap room experiences in the Midwest, as we loft our entire brewery and tap room over a spectacular indoor food hall and farmers market.

  How are you helping you might ask?  As you can imagine, build outs, especially ones in 100+ year old buildings are pricey. We are seeking $15,000 applied to our build out costs and the creation of our museum and art displays. Your donation not only helps Clutch, but local artists and the transmission of St. Paul history as well.  Our goal has always been to elevate our community and neighborhood by properly providing a space for expression, conversation, education, and creativity. 

  And if it wasn't already awesome enough to be supporting such a historic and community focused project, you get some sweet perks for contributing! 

  Look at our contribution structure and corresponding rewards to see what you can get! And please be sure to send us a message if you need your rewards shipped. Shipping charges will apply. 

High fives and hand shakes are to be redeemed in person due to potential health risks.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

So you can't afford a dollar huh? Coming from two guys starting a brewery, believe us when we say, we get it!

Well, how else can you help? Spread the word! Spread the Word! And spread the word!

By sharing the project with others we can make this goal happen and get more people involved.

 

MNvest

  So you're really jazzed about the project (who wouldn't be, am I right?). Maybe you want to contribute more than what our perks are set at. Well, that's just perfect, because we are still looking for founding members! Check out our MNvest campaign to learn more about our investment opportunities and the awesome perks that accompany becoming part of the Clutch family. Go to http://Clutch.venturenear.com and log in to peruse our investment information, learn even more about the project, and invest! Unlike our Indiegogo campaign, investors must be Minnesota residents, but don't let that keep you from stopping by the MNvest page and spreading the word!

Thank you and cheers!

story:
PLAATO is a brand new way of analyzing your ongoing fermentation. 

It's an airlock - a reinvented airlock that sends information about your beer brewing fermentation straight to your phone, including:

  • Specific Gravity 
  • Fermentation Activity 
  • Alcohol percentage 
  • Ambient temperature 
  • All 100% non-invasive

For every single batch, a unique fermentation analysis report is generated that lets you analytically understand what's going on.

PLAATO is in other words a digital hydrometer with some extra functionality.

 

PLAATO is now shipping

 

 

Check out PLAATO on Instagram, and see it in action at one of our brewers here: https://www.instagram.com/p/BmBGLdWglOh/?tagged...

 

 

 

Know when (and if) your fermentation starts, how the yeast actually works its way through the wort, and how temperature steps affects the rate of fermentation - Use the data to further understand.

 

 

Track the fermentation Plaato is always connected to internet and data is accessible through the Plaato App

In the fermentation process the glucose in the wort is mainly converted into ethyl alcohol and carbon dioxide. The alcohol stays in the wort as liquid, and the CO2 bubbles up as gas. In other words, by knowing the amount of CO2 that has been produced - we also know the alcohol produced. This is exactly what Plaato does.

PLAATO measures the flow of CO2, and knows at any time the total amount of gas that has escaped the fermenter. This data is instantly included in our advanced algorithms and valuable data can be calculated. 

The technique is in use by laboratories all over the world, but PLAATO is the first commercial product that utilizes this chemical relation and technology to give valuable information to beer brewers.

 

We have built a framework that let you connect all your PLAATO products into one app. Dive deeper into your data and learn the in´s and out´s of your brewing.

Getting deeper into the science of your brew is half the fun.

It helps you understand and recreate your results. PLAATO automatically generates an analysis report, including among others maximum and average fermentation activity, peak values, temperature extremes and other calculations from the specific batch.

Monitor how the yeast works it's way through the wort.    

PLAATO knows exactly the amount of CO2 the fermentation has generated. Specific Gravity is calculated from this, and sent to the PLAATO app, giving you the opportunity to follow the process first hand. This lets you know the fermentation activity at any given time. PLAATO uses the bubbles produced from the fermentation to monitor the the activity of your brew. By accurately counting every single bubble, the process can be monitored fully and non-invasive.

 

 

Our framework and app is configured to get data from every batch that the PLAATO's connected to. All in one place. PLAATO is in other words a connected piece of equipment that is a:

  • Brewing thermometer
  • Digital hydrometer
  • Wireless hydrometer

 

The most important stage. Bask in the glory from friends and family who enjoy your beer and appreciate your craftmannship.

 

 

 

 

PLAATO setup - Prepare your brew as you always do, and measure the Original Gravity.   

  

 

Plaato is designed by beer brewers. In other words, Plaato is 100% sanitizable, and is made of scratch-resistant Tritan®. We like to keep the fermenting wort on its own, that´s why we designed PLAATO in the same logic as a familiar airlock.

 

A: The lid - Black Tritan® twist-lock lid to minimize evaporation.  

B: The bubble generator - Made of medical grade PP. Detachable and 100% sanitizable.  

C: The main body - Clear Tritan® airlock for non-invasive measurement of CO2 generated in the fermentation process.  

D: The «click on» sensor unit - With an integrated infrared CO2-sensor, thermometer, WiFi-connection and 3 LEDs displaying the fermentation activity. Tritan® polymer is used in Plaato. It's FDA-approved, strong, sanitizable, scratch-resistant and as beautiful as glass.

  

 

 

PLAATO is made of food safe Tritan and is sanitizable with Star San, bleach or other commonly used chemicals. 

PLAATO is designed to withstand overflowing fermentations.

 

 

 

The PLAATO collaboration  

PLAATO is developed together with highly skilled partners in Norway within technology and beer:  

  • The Norwegian University of Life Sciences i Ås - right outside Oslo, and their awesome beerbrewing lab.   
  • StartupLab - Norway´s biggest entrepreneur hub.   
  • The helpful microbreweries that have been contributing with testing, understanding, and providing us with cold beers.
  • The support from Innovation Norway in the early stages.

 

No, absolutely not! We have talked extensively with professional brewers in Norway and their process during the fermentation process. We want to simplify those events and make it available to every brewer in an easy and accessible way, without hiring a bio-engineer.

We have tried, tested and redesigned the PLAATO more times than we want to admit.  Our end goal has always been to make a product that we can all stand behind, and be proud of.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A special thank you to:

 

Karin Skandsen

Ole Sprakehaug

Fredrik Vangsal  

 

 

The team behind Plaato Inc. have commercialized several products over the last few years, and we're looking forward to get the PLAATO Airlock into the hands of passionate brewers all over the world.

Naturally, there are challenges when developing new products, and we know time tends to go by faster than expected. However, we have taken many steps to assure that the PLAATO will work as promised, and that you will have it in your hands by the end of October:

*Funding: 
Plaato Inc. has been externally funded for the past 12 months. This has given us the opportunity to build a dedicated and beer loving team located in Oslo, Norway. We have been able to work a lot on the development during these months.

*Manufacturers: 
We have founded a strong and reliable supply chain and have established a close relationship with our manufacturer, including plastics, electronics assembly. Currently the manufacturer are working on the third iteration of a pre-production prototype, and only a few steps are left before the milling of the plastic injection molds can begin.

*Not a one-product-company: 
Plaato Inc. is not here to make one product. Currently we have several beer-tech products in sight that will be announced shortly after this campaign - both for industrial and private beer brewers.

The support from Innovation Norway in the early stages.
 No, absolutely not! We have talked extensively with professional brewers in Norway and their process during the fermentation process. We want to simplify those events and make it available to every brewer in an easy and accessible way, without hiring a bio-engineer.We have tried, tested and redesigned the PLAATO more times than we want to admit.  Our end goal has always been to make a product that we can all stand behind, and be proud of.Early Sketches We use Solidworks as our CAD tool Proof of concept prototypes Jiaming Gao and Michael Kononsky visits the manufacturer Injection mold tooling workshop   A special thank you to: Karin SkandsenOle SprakehaugFredrik Vangsal    The team behind Plaato Inc. have commercialized several products over the last few years, and we're looking forward to get the PLAATO Airlock into the hands of passionate brewers all over the world.Naturally, there are challenges when developing new products, and we know time tends to go by faster than expected. However, we have taken many steps to assure that the PLAATO will work as promised, and that you will have it in your hands by the end of October:*Funding: Plaato Inc. has been externally funded for the past 12 months. This has given us the opportunity to build a dedicated and beer loving team located in Oslo, Norway. We have been able to work a lot on the development during these months.*Manufacturers: We have founded a strong and reliable supply chain and have established a close relationship with our manufacturer, including plastics, electronics assembly. Currently the manufacturer are working on the third iteration of a pre-production prototype, and only a few steps are left before the milling of the plastic injection molds can begin.*Not a one-product-company: Plaato Inc. is not here to make one product. Currently we have several beer-tech products in sight that will be announced shortly after this campaign - both for industrial and private beer brewers.

story:
My name is Sierra Wood and I am the founder of Meraki Mocha. I am currently pursuing my Masters in Social Work and Masters in Nonprofit Leadership at the University of Pennsylvania with a focus on social enterprises and global affairs. I have many years of experience in the food industry, 5 years experience working with people who have intellectual and developmental disabilities, and I have a passion to see Lancaster embrace diversity through inclusivity.
 

 


When I first started working with people with disabilities, I knew that they had value and I wanted to find ways to help them. Shortly after spending more time with them, I realized that my role was not to simply help them, because they were now friends of mine- they were bringing value to my life, and I hoped to bring value to theirs. Now, I have realized that not only are many of them my friends, but they are also capable of contributing so much to society while in the work force. I no longer view people with disabilities as people that I should be helping, but, rather, people who I can work alongside with and learn from.



The dream for Meraki Mocha began five years ago. A woman I know has down syndrome and she showed me a $3 paycheck compensating 70 hours of work. This equates to roughly 4 cents/hour. It was frustrating to see someone so capable and talented, who wanted to work, being taken advantage of at her job. Meraki Mocha is a means to address this problem in a very practical way.


 

 

Meraki Mocha will be focusing on three streams of revenue. We will be selling our signature blend of coffee, beginning in October 2017, and catering services will be offered shortly after. The start-up costs for these two revenues are already covered by utilizing the owner's equity. We need your help to reach our ultimate goal, which is opening a physical location for the café!


With our fundraising goal of $20,000, Meraki Mocha will be able to purchase all coffee equipment necessary to begin catering larger events. This equipment will then be utilized in the café once a location is secured. This will allow us to hire more employees and offer extensive training, which will help us prepare for our grand opening!



Meraki means "to do something with soul, creativity, or love; to put something of yourself into your work," and that is exactly what we are doing. With your support, Meraki Mocha will make this a reality for many people!

Don't have the financial means to support us? Consider sharing this campaign with others and following us on social media!

 

--------

This crowdfunding campaign is part of The Great Social Enterprise Pitch, a friendly competition facilitated by ASSETS and the Lancaster County Community Foundation. The Pitch consists of social enterprise ideas based in Central Pennsylvania. A Social Enterprise is a market-based, income-generating enterprise that aims to solve a social and/or environmental problem through its business activities. Social enterprises focus on a trip bottom line: people, planet, and profit. Upon completion of the Crowdfunding phase of the competition, 5 ideas will be chosen to move on to the Live Pitch, during which the contestants will present their ideas to a panel of judges, with winners receiving a package of cash and pro-bono prizes. In 2017, winners received over $65,000 in cash and pro-bono prizes. Please visit www.lancasterpitch.com for more information. To access to the crowdfunding sites of all participating social enterprise ideas, click here: www.indiegogo.com/partners/SocialEnterprisePitch.

By contributing to this campaign, you give permission to this business and to ASSETS to collect and use your name, email address, and mailing address. Your information will not be sold or shared with other organizations. You may opt out of electronic communications by selecting the unsubscribe link and following instructions on any emails that you receive.

story:
Heavy Metal Ice Cream - Ice Cream Social & Meet 'N Greet Party! 11/17/17 - 7PM At Whitecliff Community Center, Crestwood, Mo.

Heavy Metal Ice Cream is proud to announce our very first ever "Ice Cream Social". It will be a chance to see more and ask questions about what we are planning to do with our future Ice Cream business, why it is so important to us to have it's home base be right here in Crestwood, Missouri, and give a summary of our plans for the future. Here's what you can expect at the party:

  • Ice Cream Taste Testing. Sample several of our concoctions from the classic "Classic Rock" - to the lavish "Glam Rock" - to the extreme "Heavy Metal".
  • Listen to music.
  • Win merchandise via Trivia Contests and Giveaways!

What We Need & What You Get

In return for your donation, you will receive:

  • Ticket(s) to our party, number of seats dependent on the donation level you choose.
  • PLENTY of Heavy Metal Ice Cream to sample and give your thoughts on during the party.
  • A chance to both purchase or WIN one of a kind Heavy Metal Ice Cream merchandise.
  • Take home souvenirs and a Heavy Metal Ice Cream flavor to enjoy for all who attend!

The Importance

We have come so far from this just being a fun idea to being in overwhelming demand from folks wanting this to happen and to see us succeed! We are showing St. Louis, and the powers that be, who can make or break the likelihood of a restaurant opening their doors, just how beloved our idea is, and why it is in demand enough to WORK once we open our doors. A successful party such as this, mixed with high, legitimate social media followers, and other factors, can be the tipping point to getting the green-light for our dream here.

 

Other Ways You Can Help Heavy Metal Ice Cream

Some people just can't contribute, don't live close enough to attend, or schedule does not permit. That's OK! Here are other ways you can help! :

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Consider a donation without a perk anyway to show your support. We find ways to reach back and thank EVERYONE no matter how much or little they can give.
  • Share this campaign on every social media platform you are a member of, as many times as you're comfortable with!

And that's all there is to it. Thank you so much for following us along in this journey to an eventual, Father & Daughter run business, in a community we care so much about seeing on the rise again, Crestwood, Missouri.

We can't thank you enough,
Chloe and Jay Smith
Crestwood, Mo. 63126
AKA - Heavy Metal Ice Cream

11/17/17 - 7PM At Whitecliff Community Center, Crestwood, Mo.

story:
Hi there, thanks for stopping at our Indiegogo campaign.  We are Ross and Didi who own Miffies Coffee; a mobile coffee truck in Orange County, California.

Our business is driven by one core value; sustainability. With this we are ever-proactive; always looking for the next step we can take to operating as a fully sustainable business.  This next step for us is to remove the gas-guzzling, disruptive generator which powers all of our equipment (think fridges, freezers, the drip filter machine, blenders, lights, POS machine... not to mention our beautiful La Marzocco coffee machine!), and install a fully solar-powered and battery solution to replace it.

Now we aren't a big corporate company,  we have no investors, no large team, and our goal is to make a difference to this planet we live on (rather than constantly taking from it).  We're successfully 100% plant-based and we are so determined to become the first, 100% powered by battery and solar coffee truck. We really are just two people determined to drive CHANGE in the industry!

Where we are now 

Our brand has become a neighborhood staple in Huntington Beach, Orange Home Grown Farmers Market, in addition to wider events around LA and Orange County such as the Rooted in Wellness event in Venice Beach at The Unlikely Florist.  As you can imagine, these are all places where sound and pollution are not a good fit!  We wish we could remove the gas generator and install a completely sustainable solution ourselves,  but like many eco-friendly technologies, such transformation comes at a huge cost and this is where we need your help. 

We do not want your help for no return (although there is an option to do that). In return for your support of our journey and our wider vision for the planet, we will give you a range of super exclusive, limited edition, cool products that we think you will enjoy - all while promoting a cause which concerns every one of us; the environment. Whether you are a local or an international investor, we have supplies readily prepared with you in mind. 

Of course, you may have some unanswered questions, so please read on to understand who we are, all the ins and outs, and how we propose to be the first fully-sustainable, vegan coffee truck in California.

We are Miffies Coffee, a husband and wife duo from the UK.  2019 was the beginning of our unique journey in starting a business that was the first of its kind; California's first, fully plant-based coffee truck. This was an invigorating venture to begin from the other side of the world, though we can't doubt it arrived with some logistical challenges (not to mention a global pandemic!). Nevertheless, this is what has made our arrival on the West Coast all the more rewarding. 

As avid travelers, we first visited the West Coast in 2018, and it has been our dream to build a life out here ever since. There's something about opening a roaming coffee truck in the UK that doesn't have the same appeal as opening in the Sunshine Coast! With this in mind, it was time we started to make this dream a reality.  After all, the West Coast is the best coast and it really was love at first sight.

Who can resist those UNREAL sunsets?! 

Because we've both been vegan for over 3 years (for all health, ethical and environmental reasons), selling exclusively plant-based was a non-negotiable for us. What's more, oat milk is starting to outsell dairy in the coffee industry and whether vegan or not, we believe oat milk tastes the best in coffee.  While we're setting a great example that coffee tastes even better with plant-based alternatives, we really want to enshrine our value around sustainability. 

There are a lot of things that you don't quite realize before you run a coffee business, and even more so a mobile coffee business! We're now increasingly aware of the waste, water consumption, and gasoline such businesses produce, but there are ways we can severely reduce this.  We want to be the pioneers of the movement by running our truck without gasoline, resulting in a much smaller footprint on the planet.  After all, plant-based is truly encompassing, and for us, it means being mindful of our lifestyle choices as much as our food choices, in order to better ourselves and the planet.

Coffee trucks need a lot of power; far more power than traditional food trucks! Our truck operates for up to 6 hours a day on the following equipment:

  • La Marzocco 2 group espresso machine
  • Fetco drip filter coffee machine
  • Mahlkonig Grinder EK43
  • Mahlkonig Grinder K30
  • Stagg Kettle
  • 2x Vitamix
  • Double fronted fridge
  • Chest Freezer
  • Water Heater
  • Water Pumps
  • Lights
  • Fans

As you can imagine that requires A LOT of power ??  

We currently have a 10,000 watt Honda generator to generate all of this power we need. Its original purpose is to power equipment on construction sites,  so as you can imagine, the noise was not a primary concern when this was designed! 

Concern 1: Noise.

Of course, it does the job for now, but we want to reduce the noise for our lovely customers and their neighbors who so kindly welcome us into their neighborhood. 

We want to be able to make coffee and hear just the warming sound of the steam wand; not the sound of the generator trying to run a marathon right by a megaphone! Whilst we give the hogs that roar down Pacific Coast Highway a run for their money, we want to provide the locals with good coffee and conversation, not disrupt and upset neighbors with the noise. 

Concern 2: Exhaust Gases.  

Burning gasoline is a smelly business and one that creates a harmful by-product, Carbon Monoxide.  While gasoline is so widely used in all industries, it's not safe for us, our staff, or our customers to ingest, not to mention its huge negative impact on the environment.  

Concern 3: The vibrations.

Those coffee nerds among us will know that we have to weigh every single shot of espresso made. As you can imagine a powerful generator, therefore, produces a lot of movement, making it difficult for us to use surrounding space effectively and also affecting the use of the coffee grinder.

Summary:

In short, the generator is a beast, but perhaps not in a good way!  We want to be able to attend all types of events such as those below as well which will allow our business to grow and add to the areas we service. 

We did explore the possibility of being powered by either a battery bank and solar panels when we first started developing our truck from the UK, however, there were a few blockers to this plan, one of these being our lack of knowledge and resource while we were concentrating our efforts on opening the business and the move to America.  

Because gas generators are the current staple in an industry we were then so new to, we couldn't lean on our truck fabricators to help build a viable solution either. Fast forward to now we have the perspective of the working day in and out with the unsustainable gas-powered generator, and as a result, we have embarked on countless hours of research, phone calls, and fierce number crunching to find a viable solution. It's not been easy - most people said it's impossible with the amount of power we need... until we came across 'SimpliPhiPower'.

SimpliPhiPower has been working in the battery-power industry since 2002 and they said it most definitely is possible.  They then put us in touch with 'Northern Arizona Wind and Sun', who will manage the project and install all of the batteries and solar panels needed to make Miffie 100% sustainably run.

 Finding people you can trust with your business is a challenge in itself - it's like sending your baby off into the unknown! As you can expect we really can't pose any further risk against our ability to trade, and for this reason, the most sensible solution is to drive our truck the 950 miles round trip to Flagstaff, Arizona, ourselves. From there Miffie will be in the very capable hands of Northern Arizona Wind and Sun and our project lead, Doug. Please check out some of their work, particularly if you want to find out any more about going solar because these guys really are the best in the business! 

Why are we asking for $39.910?  We value honesty and transparency so we have broken down exactly what the money is for in the below infographic.  

 

 

The money we need to switch to electric power isn't unconquerable.  Considering we are now a well-established, flourishing business, one may assume we could simply borrow the money from the bank and get it done with little support.  If we could, we really would do it this way!  As new residents to America, the painstaking struggle to build a credit score is what stops us in our tracks almost every time.  We've spent countless hours in the bank, completing lengthy paperwork ahead of this project; all to hear a no at the end.  No matter how well the business is thriving or that our socials are going up, we are as fresh as a 6-month-old baby in the eyes of banks and credit scores.  

It's not easy to turn to your friends, family, and the public for the support to make your dream come true, but it is simply our only option.  We need you! (In true Uncle Sam style). We need you to share and act on our vision, helping to make it become a reality.

This is only our first step in what we want to achieve as a company both long-term and short-term.  Following making the daily running of our equipment on batteries and solar, we then want to make our entire truck electric and by that, we mean the engine! It is now possible to switch out that 2002 gas engine for a sustainable alternative that doesn't harm the planet.

And after all that? We have a BIG dream to create the first off-the-grid coffee shop with space for us to grow fresh ingredients that we use every day - neat huh?  

Well, any extra money allows us to spec-up the batteries so we have more than enough power and we also have some maintenance to do on the truck.  Whistling windows and broken air conditioning units all need a touch of love as they are 18 years old, these will all be a priority for us with any extra funding.  

Whilst we are dreaming big, if it's a lot of money over then that will go towards our long-term goal and help make 'Step 2: the fully electric truck vegan coffee truck' a reality!

Well, although this isn't a reality we want to live in, it is a possibility.  If this happens Miffies Coffee will still continue to find a way to make this happen but it will take a very long time to do.  We will continue, but in a scaled-back operation that may not have longevity as we will not be able to continue trading in certain locations and will not be able to secure future events.  

We wouldn't have been able to pull off this mammoth task of putting together this Indie GOGO without a few people who all deserve a mention and a few coffees on us!

Copywriter; Elle Bolland

Video Crew:

Produced & Directed by @realsonnyday

Additional Footage by Jimmy Xie

Edited by Noah Taher

Camera by @realsonnyday

Original music "Venice" by Gyvos

And of course, our amazing friends and family who we are eternally grateful for.

Risks and challenges

We've done a lot to mitigate the risk in our project. We've spent months researching how to run our mobile coffee shop with battery and solar, spent hours on the phone, and sent many emails back and forth hatching plans. We have found the experts in the field to help us with this project, the best battery company, and some amazing installers and project managers. We have also crunched the numbers, many times. Providing we get the funding from IndieGogo, this project is GO as soon as we can hit the road to Arizona. We've been planning this in the background, working out logistics, getting all of the maintenance done on the truck, and making sure we are in shape to get to Flagstaff the second we can.

Fast forward to now we have the perspective of the working day in and out with the unsustainable gas-powered generator, and as a result, we have embarked on countless hours of research, phone calls, and fierce number crunching to find a viable solution. It's not been easy - most people said it's impossible with the amount of power we need... until we came across 'SimpliPhiPower'.SimpliPhiPower has been working in the battery-power industry since 2002 and they said it most definitely is possible.  They then put us in touch with 'Northern Arizona Wind and Sun', who will manage the project and install all of the batteries and solar panels needed to make Miffie 100% sustainably run. Finding people you can trust with your business is a challenge in itself - it's like sending your baby off into the unknown! As you can expect we really can't pose any further risk against our ability to trade, and for this reason, the most sensible solution is to drive our truck the 950 miles round trip to Flagstaff, Arizona, ourselves. From there Miffie will be in the very capable hands of Northern Arizona Wind and Sun and our project lead, Doug. Please check out some of their work, particularly if you want to find out any more about going solar because these guys really are the best in the business! Why are we asking for $39.910?  We value honesty and transparency so we have broken down exactly what the money is for in the below infographic.    The money we need to switch to electric power isn't unconquerable.  Considering we are now a well-established, flourishing business, one may assume we could simply borrow the money from the bank and get it done with little support.  If we could, we really would do it this way!  As new residents to America, the painstaking struggle to build a credit score is what stops us in our tracks almost every time.  We've spent countless hours in the bank, completing lengthy paperwork ahead of this project; all to hear a no at the end.  No matter how well the business is thriving or that our socials are going up, we are as fresh as a 6-month-old baby in the eyes of banks and credit scores.  It's not easy to turn to your friends, family, and the public for the support to make your dream come true, but it is simply our only option.  We need you! (In true Uncle Sam style). We need you to share and act on our vision, helping to make it become a reality.This is only our first step in what we want to achieve as a company both long-term and short-term.  Following making the daily running of our equipment on batteries and solar, we then want to make our entire truck electric and by that, we mean the engine! It is now possible to switch out that 2002 gas engine for a sustainable alternative that doesn't harm the planet.And after all that? We have a BIG dream to create the first off-the-grid coffee shop with space for us to grow fresh ingredients that we use every day - neat huh?  Well, any extra money allows us to spec-up the batteries so we have more than enough power and we also have some maintenance to do on the truck.  Whistling windows and broken air conditioning units all need a touch of love as they are 18 years old, these will all be a priority for us with any extra funding.  Whilst we are dreaming big, if it's a lot of money over then that will go towards our long-term goal and help make 'Step 2: the fully electric truck vegan coffee truck' a reality!Well, although this isn't a reality we want to live in, it is a possibility.  If this happens Miffies Coffee will still continue to find a way to make this happen but it will take a very long time to do.  We will continue, but in a scaled-back operation that may not have longevity as we will not be able to continue trading in certain locations and will not be able to secure future events.  We wouldn't have been able to pull off this mammoth task of putting together this Indie GOGO without a few people who all deserve a mention and a few coffees on us!Copywriter; Elle BollandVideo Crew:Produced & Directed by @realsonnydayAdditional Footage by Jimmy XieEdited by Noah TaherCamera by @realsonnydayOriginal music "Venice" by GyvosAnd of course, our amazing friends and family who we are eternally grateful for.Risks and challengesWe've done a lot to mitigate the risk in our project. We've spent months researching how to run our mobile coffee shop with battery and solar, spent hours on the phone, and sent many emails back and forth hatching plans. We have found the experts in the field to help us with this project, the best battery company, and some amazing installers and project managers. We have also crunched the numbers, many times. Providing we get the funding from IndieGogo, this project is GO as soon as we can hit the road to Arizona. We've been planning this in the background, working out logistics, getting all of the maintenance done on the truck, and making sure we are in shape to get to Flagstaff the second we can.

story:
Shots Box: The Ultimate Liquor Sampling Subscription Box

Shots Box is a monthly subscription service that brings to your doorstep an array of shot-sized liquors specially curated by tastemakers. It’s a safe way to try new alcohol, discover and share new favorites, and avoid paying top-shelf prices for full bottles of liquor that you haven’t already vetted. It’s the ultimate liquor sampling subscription box.

How Shots Box Works

With the Shots Box subscription service, you can try before you buy. For as low as $25 each month, you’ll receive six or 12 liquor samples along with related swag and cocktail recipes. Try your hand-selected samples, discover new favorites, and start shopping for liquor with confidence.

Using Shots Box’s online platform, you’ll also be able to share reviews of each sample you receive and browse reviews left by other alcohol enthusiasts. By contributing to our website, you’ll have the satisfaction of knowing that you’re helping out other consumers just like you and be rewarded with points that can be redeemed for discounts and prizes.

 

Be a Better–Informed Alcohol Enthusiast

Currently, there is no efficient or affordable way to find out which liquors you’ll truly enjoy. Sure, you can ask your local bartender or spend hours reading endless liquor labels, but you still won’t know which drinks are best suited for your tastes unless you try them out yourself. Shots Box solves this issue by allowing you to try before you buy.

Our subscription service brings you samples of the best liquors from around the country and lets you share your experiences with them online. We want you to discover new favorites and enjoy the process of becoming a better-informed alcohol consumer.

 

You Rely on Reviews for Everything Else You Buy—Why Should Shopping for Liquor Be Any Different?

Shots Box subscribers will be able to share their experiences with their curated samples online at shotsbox.com. Browse reviews left by other regular consumers like yourself and write your own to earn points that can be redeemed for discounts and prizes on Shots Box products.

 

Product Details

Each box will contain:

  • 6 or 12 Liquor Samples
  • A Recipe Card
  • A Special Shots Box Swag Item

story:
Hi my name is Aaron Castello. I'm 31 years old and work as a salesman in NY. One thing that have come to my mind, when being a guy who sits alot during his work and studder, is that drinks really should not be drinken without ice cubes. Once you go ice cubes, you almost never go back, but you don't know how ice berg cold a drink really can get if you're only drinking your soda, juice, water or anything else merely from the bottle or a glass. 

I've come to be a pretty heavy ice cube user over the past 2 years at my current company, and have thought about: "how to make the drinks taste more delicious, for everyone". The real answer was found in the current ice cube bags. They are all too big and huge. Yeah i'm also one of those who can't get them to fit in the freezer. 
+ the fact that i can't put my ice cubes wherever i want. 
My solution to this is by having smaller ice bags. I have formed out a product line with my company VEYICO to make ice cube bags the size of an iPhone 4s box, including 60 small cubes that will make your drink taste a lot better. 

1) Get your ice cubes done in the freezer in only 20 minutes! NOT 2 hrs, NOT! 3 hrs!
2) Let your kids handle the ice cubes after all it's user friendly for anyone now and they won't get cold burned. NO BIG ICE CUBES EXTREMELY COLD!
3) Get more delicious drinks. We all know a lot of smaller ice cubes who fill out your liquid is better than 3 big.
4) Don't worry about opening them. They will come in an easy strip up bag. NO more trouble with opening and getting the cubes out!
5) Pour ice cubes down your Coca-Cola bottles.
6) Get space in the freezer NO MORE FULL FREEZER!!!

ABOVE is just a few of the advantages i know my bag will bring. I have searched and found legit manufacturers for these bags with a direct shipping line in US, Europe & Asia. 
This means that no matter where you live in this beautiful happy world, you can order my ice cube bags and have them delivered strait to your door. Doing projects and adding new things is a serious and fun thing for me. Serious because i value making the best product for you guys possible, yet fun because i gotta have my goofyness with me while being passionate about something. You might also have experienced that in my voice-over video ABOVE! 

It's important for me that this project gets funded as it's something i really want and wanna work hard to let happen. I wanna make the best ice cube bag that fits your needs, that gives you: space, better drinks & better opportunities and then i'm gonna do it fairly fairly fairly cheap... Cuz who wants to spend a million bucks on something they can get much cheaper. I wanna make the best product and i wanna do it only for you guys! 
Now the part i have been most excited about through my whole speach here. YOU GUYS! It would mean honestly the world to me if you guys would fund my project. I don't care about rich or poor, if you donate 1$ or a 1,000$ the fact is that you share my vision and wanna back it up. The fact that some of you might take your time to read this is honestly enough for me. I hope you awesome people out there might share same vision and might see a young? hahah fairly committed man here who wants to bring his ice cube bags to life. I can't say it enough but it would mean the world to me. 

If you believe in me then i'd be the worlds happiest guy if you donated for my campaign even just a small donation. I'm confident we can reach the 40,000$ with alot of believers. I really hope to raise this and bring you the best ice cube bag ever and I really hope you will share this with your friends if you find me interesting at all lol... Joke aside... It would mean alot if my campaign got that expossure! You can share it on facebook, instagram, twitter or merely use IndieGoGo's sharing tools.
I have made some interesting PERKS for you to look at if you feel like you wanna try my product out or just contribute. 

Yours truly not Ariana Grande but 

Aaron Castello 

PS. I believe in this and I will fight for this. But it's in your hands. I need you!

story:
The Well Cafe is a place for people to come together for wholesome, healing, herbal drinks and food in North Oakland.  We believe deeply that food is medicine and are working to re-ignite the collective wisdom of our ancestors and to put this traditional knowledge back in the hands of the people. We do this by serving unique and delicious drinks and food, working exclusively with small local farmers, chefs and herbalists, hosting educational events and workshops, and offering everything at affordable prices. 

Our hope is that by joining us you leave feeling not just well-nourished, but deeply healthy, alive and connected to the earth and to community. We believe this is crucially important for the thriving of our planet and all people. 

Healing – We are informed by Western Herbal Medicine and supported by Ayurveda and Traditional Chinese Medicine, and well as whole food diets.  Every item on our menu is designed with health, wellness, nutrition and healing in mind, and prepared with love and integrity. 

Justice – We engage ourselves and our local community in conversations, trainings, and actions around health and wellness, food justice, gentrification, and sustainable food production. We offer an under $3 item in every menu category, have a pay-it-forward menu item, and distribute 10% of our house made retail products to local youth programs.  We strive to keep the costs of our drinks and food as low as possible. 

Sustainability and Respect for the Earth – We source our produce, dairy and meat from small local farms and school/youth garden programs who follow sustainable agriculture principles. Our herbs, teas, and spices are sustainably harvested, fair trade, and/or wildcrafted. 

Collaboration and Community – We build up and support the unbelievable talent, wisdom, and skills of local artisanal chefs, bakers, herbalists, and artists through our rotating featured chef menu item, pop-up dinners, herbal preparations, locally made desserts and snacks, our retail space, and gallery.  We host events and workshops, offer low-cost herbal clinics, provide a kid-friendly space, and provide educational materials on herbal medicine.

This project was seeded by a group of herbalists one evening in herbal medicine school in 2015, and founded by Marielle Amrhein and Karim Bishay in the summer 2016. Chef Jocelyn Jackson of Justus Kitchen developed the food menu and Herbalists Madeleina Boulduc and Frieda Kipar Bay (Taproot Medicine) collaborated on the drink menu. Staff Bae Laurel O’Connor and Alli Moses have been jamming for the past few months to birth us into being. Countless other passionate and brilliant folks have been thought partners, mentors, volunteers, and friends.

For a bit more on each of our stories, click here. 

We acquired our space by applying and being selected by the East Bay Community Space to open up the cafe as part of their complex at 55th and Telegraph in Oakland about a year ago. We set up our legal business structure, worked with numerous consultants and mentors, and completed a series of tastings and recipe development processes in the fall and winter of 2016. Since January we have been under construction and are finally nearing the end. We are currently getting ready to start setting up our kitchen, dining area and lounge. We are having an Opening Taster event with workshops and free food and drinks on June 10th. 

We’re grateful for all the support already shown by our friends, family and extended community. So far, we’ve received $20,000 for tenant improvement from our landlords, raised $40,000 from family and friends, contributed $15,000 from our personal life savings, and $20,000 from investors. It is our strong hope to avoid high interest bank loans, and to instead utilize the amazing opportunity of crowdfunding to raise the additional funds we need to open our doors, sustain our new business, and give back to the community.

We are so close, but we need your help! Many of you have been asking when we will open and how you can help. This is your chance: support our IndieGoGo campaign and share widely and wildly with everyone you know. Know that your contribution of any amount will be instrumental in allowing us to open our doors, keep our costs down, provide drink and food as medicine, support local farmers, herbalists and artisanal chefs, support a woman-run, family-centered business, and to pay our employees living wages so they can afford to live and work in the same city. 

In return, we will offer you an array of perks including: a personalized herbally-infused meal for you and your guests;  a handcrafted tincture or tea blended specifically for you; a free meal donated to someone in need; free drinks when you come in; among many other perks. 

Your donations will allow us to do the following (drum roll please): 

$15,000

By helping us raise $15,000 you will help us purchase equipment that we need to be able to prepare the unique and delicious items on our menu: 

  • Water purification system (to remove impurities and provide clean water)
  • Commercial grade herb and spice grinder (to freshly grind herbs for medicine making)
  • Vitamix (for cacao elixirs, smoothies, and herbal-infused sauces and dressings)
  • Hot water dispenser for tea and pour over coffee (so you don't have to wait for us to heat up the water)
  • Induction Burners (so we can have multiple different herbal preparations steeping or cooking simultaneously)
  • Commercial refrigerators
  • Stainless steel working tables (required by the health department)
  • Freezer (to store our artisanal tempeh, wild-caught Alaskan smoked salmon, herbal ice cream and bone broths)
  • Convection oven (for warming up the herbal pies, vegan cookies, and gluten free scones)

 

$20,000

With $20,000, we will be able to cover our cash requirements for working capital until we hit our break-even point and allow us to fund the following:

  • Living wage salaries and health insurance for Marielle and two staff (Marielle has been working for free for over a year, and current staff at part-time)
  • Operating costs (utilities, internet, etc.)
  • Initial Set-up Inventory, plus on-going inventory
  • Marketing and communications
  • Educational Materials
  • Rainy day fund

 

$25,000

With $25,000, we will be able to fully launch our educational programs, provide free access of our space to local herbalists and chefs, and create a retail area. We set out from the beginning to make sure that The Well gave back to the community and we know the value of simply providing a place for people to gather and have access to healthy affordable food. We want to enhance this aspect of the vision by utilizing the space for classes, workshops, events, and meet-ups that all serve a broader range of folks. 

Other ways you can support

Even if you aren’t able to make a contribution, you can still help out! Like us on Facebook and Instagram. You can also share the link to this campaign with your social media networks and talk about us to your neighbors and friends, encouraging folks to contribute.
